mapper.insert: insert into alg_cash_trans (tra_sn, usr_sn, pay_time, pay_no, status, pay_src, cash_pay_amount, currency, credit_per_unit, description, create_time) values (#{traSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paySrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cashPayAmount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditPerUnit,jdbcType=REAL}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
